msg.msgText:
imaserver user add "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver user add help imaserver user add "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver user add "UserID=webUser1" "Type=WebUI" "Password=XXXXX" "GroupMembership=MessagingAdministrators" imaserver user add "UserID=msgUser1" "Type=Messaging" "Password=XXXXX"
Configuration items are: UserID The user ID. Type The user type. Only [WebUI] or [Messaging] are allowed. Password The password for the user. GroupMembership Add the user as a member of this group. For WebUI user type, only [SystemAdministrators], [MessagingAdministrators] or [Users] are allowed. Description The description for the user. NOTES: 1. "UserID", "Type" and "Password" are required items. 2. "GroupMembership" must be specified if user type is WebUI. 3. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
